website_summaries.verdict: Between its ability to ride 15.7 miles on a single charge, its smooth ride, and how simple it is to fold down when you’re done riding, Swagtron’s EB7 is an excellent electric bike.
pros: Easily folds down for compact storage
cons: A bit heavier than it looks

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy a scooter
customer_reviews.text: This unit will only go 17mph and since you cant peddle after 5 miles an hour because of the gearing and there is no changing gears. I tested the unit on flat ground as i live in florida the fist time I got 2 miles before the battery died then full charge that took all day I then got 3.6 miles throttle only. It is fun to ride but the thin small tires make it a bit unstable. The last time I charged the bike again it got 3.7 miles the only possible way to get 15.miles on a charge would be to do it at 5mph wile peddling total disappointment and i will be returning the unit...
customer_reviews.author: SailTSB

customer_reviews.title: The best E-Bike I've ridden so far!
customer_reviews.text: At first I bought the EB-5 but later found out about the EB-7. I cancelled the EB-5 and bought the EB-7. The upgrades on the EB-7 are so worth the extra 100$. Some upgrade are, *Rear Suspension *Faster speeds *16inch tyres *Removable battery *Display controller *Disc brakes *Electronic headlight and horn The fastest speed I've got was 18.5 mph and I'm 5'11 210lb. I will definitely recommend this bike to anyone whose looking for a fast, compact, reliable and stylish adult e-bike.
customer_reviews.author: BillyZee

customer_reviews.title: Defective bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is defective! or is it something I do not understand !!! I'm so sad
customer_reviews.author: Timur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect e-bike?
customer_reviews.text: Is this the perfect e-bike? If compared to 3 or 4 thousand dollar bikes maybe not. But when you consider all you get for the price, this just might be the perfect e-bike. When riding it feels like a full size bike. Yet it is easy to move on stairs and will fit in small places. There are many more features to be mentioned but others have all ready done so. I highly recommend bike and seller, Better Choice Online.
customer_reviews.author: otto goepel

customer_reviews.title: After 600 miles
customer_reviews.text: Update: still going strong except for the rust (I rode in the rain few times). Still the same battery, no loss of power, I use it for short distances now to pick up my food. Still think it was a good purchase. Still holding up well. Been using this to commute to work in Brooklyn. One charge can get me there and back (total of 9 miles, hills on the way back) top speed 19. I changed the crank to 53 teeth, goes slightly faster but more control (with the stock crank you basically “pedal air” in mod 3). Will update after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sillyfox81

customer_reviews.title: Swagcycle EB-7 review in Seatle
customer_reviews.text: One thing to be careful is handle and the front brake setting and make sure the brake doesn't hold the front tire tight. Remember to remove the key from the battery lock before bending the bike. I already bent one key because of the wrong operation. The type of battery can not be brought on the plane or the international shuttle bus. The distance for once trip is fair by a full-charged battery. The speed setting is safe for riding. The front light is enough when riding in night.
customer_reviews.author: CHVJOHN

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: As another review showed in a video, the "horn" is malfunctioning and goes off constantly. It seems to be an issue with the wiring. Sending it in as an RMA requires you to pay for shipping. Freshly out of the box and I have to spend more money on the bike to get it running. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lauri keane

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate portable ebike
customer_reviews.text: Ultimate bike for self and kids!! Folding and easy to use e bike. Can be used without power not bad for a single gear. Compatible with any bike trailers! I recommend schwinn for comfort. Thanks Swag
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun and fast, the brake are super powerful. and there is 3 speed levels. LED head light is very bright. Fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good bike. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. He bikes to work a lot but he is getting older so we decided to get him an assist bike. Works well. He is very pleased with it. Simple to use. He uses it during light rainy days too added top cover wheel piece to stop rain splashers when he was riding. Looks and feels well made. It looks so good that his coworkers are now interested in getting one
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: For short riders
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the quality and and design of this bike for the money, except for one caveat. it is best for small riders. The handbook recommends extending full leg length from seat to pedal, which is reliable advice, but this is unattainable because the seat post is too short to permit a rise that can accommodate legs longer than 29 or 30 inches from crotch to foot sole. I'm confident that solutions to extending the seat riser can be found, and I'll be looking for them. Otherwise the bike performs as advertised, with speeds slightly in excess for 18 mph possible, and a generally good fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super portable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for getting around at music festivals. Been struggling with an injury for over a year and this is a lifesaver. I can zoom around with little effort even on grass. I've been taking it with me lots of places thanks to the portability. Folds down quickly and fits easily in the trunk of my hatchback. No regrets so far.
customer_reviews.author: taekvideo

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the price when it was $599
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bike overall but when I got it the disc brakes squealed alot, the battery didn't last as long as I thought it would but I think the description of milage is for 1st gear, and since it's only single gear bike, it's impossible to peddle with motor in 2nd and 3rd gear. I almost returned it to get the swagtron eb7 plus because it has 7 gears but at the time they were out of stock. So I just settled for this one. But I've learned to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Have to say this was worth every penny. Have been enjoying the ease of riding this since I bought it . The EB-7 is perfect for me and I added a review mirror and a easy clip on rear light and I am all set. The front light is bright and really glad its there. Its a blast and folds up perfect for the back of my SUV, Charging is quick and we rode it a lot today and it only dropped 2 bars. THRILLED
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Prater

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good e bike for the price. Wish it was a little more powerful but it's reasonable for its size and weight. The folding mechanism is done well. I wish the peg below the chainring that rests on the floor when it's folded would be changed to a small wheel instead. Range isn't as good as advertised. I was able to get about 10 miles of range on flat ground and between 10-15mph for most of the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 9 years old daughter and she's can't stop riding it. I'm little worried about the battery life but the neighbors are having fun trying out and is already asking their parents for one. The handle bar doesn't shorten so can be tough if you're short. But she is able to ride without a problem. I highly recommend but I'm not that I would buy one for me as an adult male. I want a "real" one with bigger wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great e bike for the price but, check and make sure key for battery works. They included the wrong key so it was useless if I could not replace battery when needed. Had to return it. Will be ordering a new one thou.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! I love this bike!!
customer_reviews.text: I commute 4 miles to work and back home each day and I love this bike!!! I got a flat back tire the second day I rode it to work and had no problem taking it to my local bike shop to get it fixed. It's a little heavy so at first I had to wrestle with it to get the battery out and to fold it and get it in my car. But once I got my technique down it hasn't been a problem at all. This bike has made me love my trip to work and has gotten me back into riding a bike! I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Great EBike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ebike came very well packaged so no parts could be damaged in transit. User guide recommends tires at 65 psi but by experience with the bike, I recommend more like 50 psi. Ebike EB 7 Plus rides great. 3 electric speed modes, mode 1 at 11 mph, already feels quick, imagine mode 3 at 18 mph. Wear a helmet for sure. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Poulton

customer_reviews.title: Swag trons on point! Great for the team during events professional
customer_reviews.text: This electric bike was exactly what I was looking for, faster than you would expect! its stylish and simple to assemble/dissemble! if you like electric swag bikes lower the seat n slow ride. In a hurry and want to look professional? just raise the seat up and cruise. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Nice e-bike for commutes and easily fit in any car if the weather changes.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to get to and from the train station 2 miles from home. Throttle control is great as I would prefer not to pedal unless needed. Will pull me up hills and I'm ver 200lbs. Best of all when it rains my wife can pick me up and I can easily fit the bike in the FIat 500e. Well worth it as similar bikes will have smaller motors and pedal assist only. Would ne nice if it came with fenders but inexpensive enough to add.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Battery life -  break noise
customer_reviews.text: It was generally a good bike until the following: 1- battery life gave me only 5 miles (tried twice in different weather conditions) 2- break noise is so annoying I want to thanks amazon for returning the bike with a full refund, but I really regret returning it, i wish it would worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: It a great E-bike the battery life is ok. Wish it work longer with the same power it have when it on a high voltage or better to say when the battery is high it work great when the battery is at one or two percent battery. It run out The real quick got a battery life. That’s why you feel the drainage and the ride of battery.But overall a great bike great ride great friend I wish I was a little bit lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Luis cruz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery died in less than 2 miles on the first ride. Sent it back. Juat ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Rolassa

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bike, very quick delivery. Tall guy, weigh 240 lbs, very comfortable fit!! Usually go for fast options, the 3rd gear actually seems really fast for the size of the bike. Would definitely recommend. No problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: bought this eb7 for my gf and she is loving it. we ride all over town and the battery lasts longer than expected. seems to be well made and comfortable to ride.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: The shipping and delivery was very quick overall a very good bike
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good bike and good performance very well-made rides very very well and very comfortable ride overall it's a great bike I would definitely recommend buying this bike
customer_reviews.author: carlos firestone

customer_reviews.title: Two in one bike
customer_reviews.text: I am going to be 77 yrs old this year. I wish I knew about this bike a long time ago. I am just loving it. I go around with my grand daughter on her scooter and my son on his scooter. But I have the luxury of sitting. Looking forward to some nicer weather so I can get some exercise. It is a big plus for any age to be able to pedal for exercise and then just cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ebike for camping trips
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ebike to take with us on camping trips. It has worked out well for that purpose. We have been on two camping trips since we bought it. Very satisfied with it. I'm still wondering how to fix a flat on the rear tire if I ever have one. Anyone?
customer_reviews.author: Sonny65

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life. Won’t last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Just about good enough build quality. This bike is very heavy. Biggest drawback is that the battery does not last long at all. Performance drop off was fast. Now it barely covers 1 miles on level 2 pedal assist before cutting out.
customer_reviews.author: freym

customer_reviews.title: Neat bike but too slow
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little bike, super convenient to get around town. But it's only gear is configured such that it only goes up to 10mp on flat ground. It's also too weak and battery last too short for hilly place where I live. So I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: BohemianBaller

customer_reviews.title: Battery life pitiful. Seat awful. Arrived with warped rear brake rotor.
customer_reviews.text: Bike arrived with a warped rear brake rotor. The seat was terrible. Recommend replacing it immediately if you order one. Bought the bike for an 8 mile round trip commute on flat urban roads. I am within the weight limits advertised. Rode it for a week. Even with pedaling and very little stop-and-go, the bike died on me twice at the 6th mile marker. Sad. I returned it to Amazon after only a week.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Vanegas

customer_reviews.title: good bike
customer_reviews.text: Good bike, but had to return it because i thought it had the 7 gear with this model, it actually not., ... so I returned it and brought the non removable battery version eb5 for a hundred dollar cheaper instead.
customer_reviews.author: T Ma

customer_reviews.title: battery life & speed
customer_reviews.text: Battery goes on 10 miles on a full charge using all 3 levels on a test with continuous pedaling. More testing to follow if battery will stay longer or possibly shorter. Max speed is 13.1 at level 3 full throttle and constant pedaling. Your claim is a little exaggerated. Gerald Cauilan Las Vegas, Nevada
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price (Super Fun)
customer_reviews.text: Great ebike for all ages. This bike puts a smile on everyone face when riding. I would have given 5 star review however the brakes are very loud and no extra batteries are available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Breaks quick
customer_reviews.text: This bike is JUNK. It broke after using it for 2 months, the exchange process was miserable. It took a full month to get a replacement, and when I got it, it came broken. Such a disaster of a product. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Storing folded for a long time might break it
customer_reviews.text: Left it folded in a closet for 3 months due to pandemic. When I got it out again the ceramic folding mechanism had snapped in half. Doesnt look like there is any way to repair it. Only had it 3 months before storing it. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new bike. The battery last a long time. You can ride it with it on or off. Its very appealing. Its also very heavy it takes both of us to fold n get into car. So far its a good bike
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Samot

customer_reviews.title: Good motor 350w for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Strong motor I like this bike, only problem is the horn switch breaks. Fell apart I think it's from shipping. But still the product is good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for RVers
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy but relatively compact. Sturdy. Fun. Pretty quick. Headlight control should be it’s own button and not be a hidden function. Buy and extra battery, extra wide comfort seat, sturdy carry bag. Great product for RVers especially in class B vans where you don’t want to store bikes on outside rack.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Kerkhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great for commuting!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it’s really fun to ride. Almost forgot how much I use to love riding bikes growing up. Only ridden it for a short time so not sure the durability. Time will tell but overall a great and solid product, making commutes both easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando O.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Everything and a bag-o-chips! Some small issues with the battery life. HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE! If there is a problem , contact a bike repair shop. Swagtron sent me used parts in the mail! Battery life is not as advertised. Get another battery if they have it online anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Collins

customer_reviews.title: very handy to have
customer_reviews.text: Since the lock down I have used this for trips to the store. I wish there was a spare battery that could be purchased. Very good product. 4
customer_reviews.author: Melmoss951

customer_reviews.title: Good price but heavy and computer issues
customer_reviews.text: Had computer issue from day one and I had to return it. Otherwise it was zippy. The pedals don’t really do much, especially once you get a little speed.
customer_reviews.author: JeremyBV

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: the battery for this bike is not good, I only have 92 miles on the bike, the company is hedging on replacing the battery. Only have had the bike for 9 months,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best E-bike Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Saving me $200 worth of monthly parking fees in NYC!
customer_reviews.author: GMT

customer_reviews.title: Flat tire
customer_reviews.text: I was enjoying this Ebike until I had a flat tire just road it 3 times only have 20 miles on the bike have the bike for less than a week , thanks for Amazon customer service able to return the product now I’m Wondering if it’s worth it to have a replacement or buy a different bike
customer_reviews.author: ItzMeTbone

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The bike was easy to set up. I have ride the bike for 90 miles. The battery life is about 12 miles. I adjusted the rear disk break. So far so good. Will see whether the bike can last long.
customer_reviews.author: Hua Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bike
customer_reviews.text: My dislike is the seat. It is very very hard. I am 242lbs and this bike goes with no issues. I'm looking into buying my wife one now. I have so much fun on it I'd like her to ride with me. You all should really get one of these bikes and have fun now.
customer_reviews.author: Eric davis

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love this bike! It had enabled me to get back out and exercise in spite of my arthritis. Folds for portability so it doesn't require a carrier. Battery is replaceable so the bike doesn't have to be replaced when the battery life is over. Length and height are much more comfortable than other bikes were tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jill G.

customer_reviews.title: Charger failure
customer_reviews.text: This bike was great, until I charged it twice then the charger failed and could no longer charge the bike. I've been back and forth with customer service for a week and a half and finally got a response that the chargers are out of stock until mid June, 3 weeks from today. I had to buy a third party charger for $30 plus shipping. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ahrendt

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 11 YO son. Easy to use and seems durable. Have had it a month. He has put about 45 miles on it so far. I ride it too and like it. Wish it had a tail light.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: No keys - worn tires
customer_reviews.text: When i received this product and opened the box, I noticed the tires were worn. There was an empty white box that keys should of been in, and there was none. I couldn't even use it and I was so excited. Now I have to wait for the replacement and hopefully its brand new with keys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great,is fast,love the cruise control... highly recommend... customer service was great,got it in two days, thanks
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Bike is overall as described
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike and exactly what I needed. Only issues during unboxing were the visible chips on handle and split in the leather on the seat. Could have been from the packaging of the bike, but for what I spent, I have requested a new one to be sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this bike for the price. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: So fun. She loves it. I bought one to ride with her. Just do it
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: BRAKES DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: The brakes do not work. I tighten them, they loosen. The bike shop tightens them, they loosen. They simply do not work. They scrape and squeak, but do not stop the bike. Crashed because neither brake worked today.
customer_reviews.author: mike judge

customer_reviews.title: Flat on first ride
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great little bike. I just got a flat on my first ride, maybe just unlucky. To fix a flat it becomes a major issue because you have to ship it back and pay for it. Customer service slow and seem uninterested.
customer_reviews.author: Branislav Dovedan

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies fast have 125 miles bike squeaks brakes squeak
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shimonov

customer_reviews.title: Very good in it’s category
customer_reviews.text: For its price, it is good enough. I enjoy every ride with this bike. More than 250 mph and still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: EB-7 is the BEST folding ebike both under 45pounds and $700!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Cruise control is nice for riding without hands. I'm 5'11" , fits perfect. Great to have in my car & no one says a thing when I take it into the mall or a store, i dont even need a lock! Only 40lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is as advertised, it folds up nicely and fits well in the trunk of a car or (as I use it) the storage compartment under a seni truck bunk bed. Cold weather dose effect performance a bit but it is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Super bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived fully assembled in two days. The quality was much better then I had expected. Great bike great price. If I needed two I would by another.
customer_reviews.author: naiperson

customer_reviews.title: Can't find replacement batteries in stock anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because it never charged properly. When it ran it was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tony McCaughn

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy our EB-7, and find it very easy to set up and ride.
customer_reviews.author: Dhines

customer_reviews.title: Good little bike!
customer_reviews.text: A really nice bike, of coarse it could be a little quicker, but that’s just me. Rides nice and does exactly as they described. Just a fun little bike!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike!
customer_reviews.text: Guys, don't think it ! just do it! I love this bike, great quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: dany m.

customer_reviews.title: Quality made
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I made all year. Highly recommend and super fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great bike and good value
customer_reviews.text: EB7 nice bike so far. Have rode about 40 miles so far with out any problems. Pedal assist is nice on hills. Great bike for the price. Nice first pedal assist bike.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Trower

customer_reviews.title: Bike of the future
customer_reviews.text: Man this bike is the shiiiiit! I’m 220lbs and this bike still goes 20mph on 3rd gear, 12mph on 1st gear. Just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: De V.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: This e-bike is amazing for the price. Good battery life and range. Easy to ride. Best deal out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Anastasov

customer_reviews.title: Most underrated ebikes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Ebike for the price. Looks and performs like something over $1000. I weigh 230 pounds yet the bike carry me everywhere with my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Kimleng Chea

customer_reviews.title: Bike beautiful, portable, stylish, easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: Bike beautiful, portable, stylish, easy to ride and incredible to pedal! I have not yet had time to analyze the autonomy, but walking on it with the help of the electric motor is a delight!
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Won't last you 15 miles
customer_reviews.text: 15 miles ......yea right, lasted me 6 miles, very disappointed, maybe if u weight less than 130
customer_reviews.author: Krzysztof K.

customer_reviews.title: bike
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i don't like is wen you fold the bike they don't have a hook to keep it close
customer_reviews.author: jorge leroux

customer_reviews.title: This bike is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This bike is a waste of money , the part that holds the axle broke
customer_reviews.author: willys

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Very portable and easy to store in the trunk of my car
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hara

product_meta.title: Swagtron Swagcycle EB-7 Elite Folding Electric Bike
feature_bullets: Ride Your Way – A hybrid mix between a traditional bike and an electric power bike, the Swag cycle EB7 Elite features 16-inch wheels and three riding modes: throttle-only, pedal-only or power-assisted pedal-to-go. More than just another battery bike.

Extended Mileage – Capable of going up to 15. 5 miles on a single charge, with a powerful 350W motor capable of throttle-only speeds up to 18. 6 mph. The Swag cycle Elite electric road bike is truly built for the long haul.
Removable Battery – The motorized bike’s swappable 36V Li-ion battery can fully recharge in 3-4 hours. Grab an extra battery (sold separately) and keep it as a spare whenever you need it.
Rugged, Smooth and Steadfast – With an IPX4 rating and advanced rear suspension, this electric commuter bike handles outdoor rides and rough pavement like a champ.
Dimensions: 67 x 26.3 x 44.5 in (unfolded), 39.4 x 17.7 x 27.6 in (folded)
Gold-Standard Service – All new Swagtron e bikes enjoy a 1-year limited.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
